css_basics_desc: CSS syntax, CSS selectors, ways to add styles to HTML, cascading and specificity, inheritance in CSS
text_styling_desc: font properties (font-size, color, font-style, font-weight, etc.), text styling (text-indent, text-align, text-transform, line-height), using Google Fonts
box_model_desc: box model (margin, padding, border), box-sizing, block and inline elements, display property, element positioning (float, flexbox, grid)
colors_units_desc: color systems (RGB, HEX, HSL), CSS units (px, em, rem, %, vw/vh)
advanced_css_desc: pseudo-classes and pseudo-elements, advanced CSS selectors, responsive design
styling_animation_desc: using CSS variables with :root selector, creating complex CSS animations with @keyframes
resources_tools_desc: using Google Fonts, sources of free graphics and video, color scheme creation tools, basics of working with graphic programs
practical_skills_desc: creating page layouts, styling buttons and menus, working with graphic designs (mockup), debugging CSS code, optimizing CSS code
